summary: CAR HAS 24K MILES ON IT. DURING A TRIP THE CAR BEGAN TO WOBBLE DRIVING ON THE INTERSTATE. I NOTICED THE TIRE HAD A BULGE ON IT. I REPLACED IT. THE CAR STILL WOBBLED. I TOOK IT TO A KIA DEALERSHIP AND THEY SAID ANOTHER OF THE TIRES HAD GONE BAD, BUT IT SHOULD GET ME HOME. I HAD A BLOWOUT ON THAT TIRE ON THE WAY HOME ALSO DRIVING ON THE INTERSTATE. THE TIRES ARE OEM NEXEN CP662'S. THE REMAINING 2 TIRES ARE PREMATURELY WORN AND HAVE BEEN ROTATED WITH EACH OIL CHANGE.
